title: McElroy talks about the UGA/FL game in Jacksonville, ranks his P5 conference champions most likely to repeat and looks ahead to Pac 12 Media Days with Jon Wilner
description:
McElroy understands why Kirby Smart wants the UGA/FL game out of Jacksonville. Plus he ranks the P5 conference champions on probability of repeating. Jon Wilner also joins the show to talk Pac-12 in the wake of USC and UCLA leaving for the Big 10 and why it’s not ALL Larry Scott's fault.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: McElroy understands Kirby Smart wanting a home and home for the Florida game and ranks his conference champions most likely to repeat.  Plus Jon Wilner joins the show to look ahead to Pac 12 Media Days in the wake of USC and UCLA announcing they are leaving for the Big 10.
